Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2011 04:32AM LovesDogs wrote: BMX w immediate reconstruction (TE's) scheduled for Dec. 9.  Bad time of year to be laid up, but I guess it will get me out of fighting the crowds at the shopping malls!   Best wishes and prayers for all of you December surgery ladies.
Posts.Title: December 2011 Surgeries - want to wait together? CookieMonster Moonflwr912

Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2011 04:38AM LovesDogs wrote: dear faithhopenluv: I had a lumpectomy with SNB on Nov. 16.  MRI showed a 1.6 cm mass and another suspicious mass posterior & lateral.  Both were removed (second was 2.8cm).  Both ductal ca with similar features.  I really didn't have much discomfort afterward - took one dose of Tramadol that night and one the next morning and none after that.  The SNB site was a little more sore but not bad.  I took a walk the day after and was back to exercising and jogging in about a week.  Good luck with your procedure.  I'm sure it will go smoothly.
Posts.Title: December 2011 Surgeries - want to wait together? CookieMonster Moonflwr912
